entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
